document.webtitle: Is it really that expensive to eat out in Paris? I am taking my son to Paris for three days and two nights and? - Yahoo! UKIreland Answers
document.description: What you can do, to make restaurant bills ... The Monoprix is a good idea but their selection is ... will not be easy to find a sit down (not fast food) restaurant ...
